short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds extra features directly to Sisu, allowing you to read other students' reviews of courses and write your own!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sisu Course Reviewer seamlessly integrates with Sisu (the Finnish student information system) and allows you to easily read and make reviews of university courses with no hassle or external websites.

Currently the only supported university is Aalto University.

Courses are rated on "Quality", "Workload" and "Difficulty" on a scale of 1-5, and are also given a free form text review.
